item.title: 第一篇Post
item.description: 这是一级标题 这是二级标题 这是正文 This is an inline \(q\left(\mathbf{x}_t \mid \mathbf{x}_0\right)=\mathcal{N}\left(\mathbf{x}_t ; \sqrt{\bar{\alpha}_t} \mathbf{x}_0,\left(1-\bar{\alpha}_t\right) \mathbf{I}\right)\) equation. next line These are block equations: \[a^*=x-b^*\] \[ a^*=x-b^* \] \[ \hat{\mathbb{E}}_{\tau_i}\left[\nabla_w \log \left(D_w(s, a)\right)\right]+\hat{\mathbb{E}}_{\tau_E}\left[\nabla_w \log \left(1-D_w(s, a)\right)\right] \] These are block equations using alternate delimiters: $$a^*=x-b^*$$ $$ a^*=x-b^* $$ $$ a^*=x-b^* $$ 111 click me
